p: The following drugs and reagents were used in this study: Carbon tetrachloride (CCl 4) and silymarin were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich, USA, standard Kits for assay of aspartate transaminase (AST), alanine transaminase (ALT), alkaline phosphatase (ALP), Total cholesterol, triglycerides, Glucose, High-density lipoprotein (HDL-c), Bilirubin (total and direct), Creatinine, Urea, and uric acid levels were purchased from Biosystems, Spain, and Diethyl ether was obtained from (Sigma-Aldrich, Germany).
